robocup.managers

Class DetectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • robocup.managers.DetectionManager

  • public class DetectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    DetectionManager class is used to receive the conditions of game objects from the grSim and as a start point of the the loop
    Author:
    alaa13212
